A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Who was that old man? Because it wasn't Luke Skywalker. This movie took my favorite character from the originals and turned him into somebody I can't recognize. Even Mark Hammil hated his new character and that should've been a hint to Rian Johnson that things would not end up well. Now\, Johnson is having to address fans all the time due to backlash. Note to writers/directors: just because you have plot twist after plot twist in your films does not qualify them to be great movies. Stick to what has brought you over 40 years and don;t ruin it instead.
